ai-mil3.6.4:1.2_0: “Reverend Sir, may you become a Buddha in his human form!”
ai-mil3.6.4:1.4_0: “Well then, sir, the Buddha is the highest goal.”
ai-mil3.6.4:1.5_0: “But great king, is there a bull elephant that’s arrow?”
ai-mil3.6.4:1.7_0: “ great king, why does he make sure that one made? And who does it not long?”
ai-mil3.6.4:1.9_0: “Well then, great king, Koṇāgamana, and Kassapa.”
ai-mil3.6.4:1.11_0: “But great king, what is this one who is unobstructed?”
ai-mil3.6.4:1.13_0: “Well then, great king, that is Brahmā.”
ai-mil3.6.4:3.1_0: the Fortunate One’s spiritual practitioners is the fourth teacher’s spiritual power,
